entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
